Pre-Game Insights: We have to do well to go forward, but they (team) have the ability to do so.
Still, when we play against a Test nation, I feel they are not hard enough. But it will come.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Oman first appeared in an ICC men's T20 World five years ago; the most recent edition of the tournament.

This time around, they'll have bigger ambitions. The nation, ranked 18th in the world on the ICC T20I team rankings, will be eyeing a spot in the 'Super 12 stage with two qualification places up for grabs in each of the first-round groups.
The PNG squad is the first group of players to represent the country at a men's World Cup, 48 years after the nation was named an associate member by the ICC.
Others: Oman aren't exactly World Cup old-timers themselves, with this tournament being only the country's second appearance at a Men's T20 World Cup.
But the 2021 tournament has an extra-special edge for the nation due to their role as co-hosts.
For the opening week, all Group B matches in the first round will be held at the Al Amerat Cricket Stadium, giving Oman home advantage in their bid to face off with the best in the world.
